name: Pick Up and Play
description:
Simple and short puzzle platformer made for the #GMTKJam 2020.  Contains 4 levels. Made in 48 hours.

What you see is what you can do. What's out of sight is out of control.

There isn't really a story I prepared , I was thinking of a cyberspace aesthetic but I was focused on just getting the mechanics fleshed out, hopefully what's here is enough to give a glimpse of potential concepts. I think this would work better as a first person game tbh.

Requires a keyboard.

Credits:
Shweep (Solo Dev)
Agargara (Music) (Borrowed from via Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported)
